list.note: sticker_glossLamination Stickers offer a superb enhancement to the overall look and durability of your printed stickers. By applying a thin plastic film, either in Matte or Gloss finish, over the printed surface of your sticker, you achieve a sleek and polished look. This layer of lamination not only elevates the visual appeal of your stickers but also fortifies them against external elements. It effectively shields your stickers from damage such as scratches, moisture, and general wear and tear, ensuring they remain vibrant and intact for a longer duration. Laminated stickers are an excellent choice for those looking to combine style with functionality, providing an extra layer of protection that helps preserve the quality and color of the print.

Custom paper stickers serve as powerful tools for marketing, ideal for adding a personalized touch to both products and services. They offer an innovative way to directly communicate promotions or important information to your customers. In a business-to-business context, custom stickers act as excellent promotional allies, quickly grabbing the attention of prospective clients. Moreover, they significantly bolster the image of your brand, boosting the chances of successful partnerships. Our services ensure rapid delivery of high-quality custom sticker printing across Dubai and nationwide, helping your business stand out effortlessly.

We offer high-quality Matt Paper stickers and labels available in both vibrant full-color and classic black & white. Our products are durable, cost-effective, and crafted with precision to meet the highest standards of quality. Choosing our Matt stickers to represent your brand is an excellent strategy to enhance your visibility and showcase your unique identity in the marketplace.

list.note: PVC sticker printing in Dubai is one of the most popular choices for both businesses and individuals looking for a durable and versatile solution for their labeling and branding needs. PVC stickers are ideal for any flat surfaces, offering a sleek and professional appearance.
Longer Lifespan: PVC stickers are known for their durability, ensuring that your labels remain intact and legible for an extended period.
Versatility: These stickers are perfectly suited to work around corners, curves, and edges, making them ideal for a variety of applications.
Enhanced Protection: Adding lamination to PVC stickers can further improve their lifespan, providing additional protection against scratches, moisture, and UV exposure.

list.note: Epoxy stickers, also known as epoxy bubble stickers or epoxy 3D stickers, are crafted from polyurethane. This material is poured over each decal, forming a clear, thick layer that imparts a high-quality, three-dimensional appearance. The transparent coating enhances the epoxy labels, giving them an eye-catching 'pop' that stands out to everyone. These stickers are commonly found on wrappers, cans, bottles, CD bags, envelopes, and folders. Additionally, many vehicles today feature epoxy stickers with the manufacturer's brand logo. The durability and striking look of epoxy stickers make them a popular choice for various applications.
To ensure the perfect fit, we offer the option of creating physical samples before moving forward with the full print run. This allows you to verify the fit and finish, giving you peace of mind.
Additionally, we manufacture durable outdoor epoxy stickers designed to withstand harsh weather conditions, ensuring your labels remain intact and vibrant, no matter the environment.

list.note: Introducing our new repositionable vinyl window clings! These clings are simple to apply and remove in less than a minute, giving the effect of a sticker without any messy adhesive.

With excellent durability, you can easily change their position whenever needed. Designed specifically for glass and windows, these clings are perfect for any DIY project, eliminating the need for a professional applicator.
Our window clings are non-adhesive, ensuring a secure 'cling' to the window for easy placement, removal, and repositioning. Reusable and convenient, they make decorating and redecorating a breeze.

list:
Apply a 2mm bleed over the finished size Convert all fonts to paths or curves Convert all colors to CMYK or Grayscale (no RGB, PMS, Pantone, or Spot colors) Flatten transparency effects Set overprints correctly for desired result Remove all color profiles Ensure all bitmap images are minimum 300dpi and in CMYK color mode Ensure reversed type (light type on dark background) is a minimum of 7pt Supply all files separately as individual PDFs (not multi-page documents) Ensure borders and type are within safe zone as variations may occur when trimming Remove registration marks, keylines, dielines, and other non-printing items If crop marks are required, ensure they are positioned outside the bleed area

  • 300gsm Gloss or Matt
  • 350gsm Gloss or Matt

Order your event tickets or coupons through Deluxe Printing for superior quality. Deluxe offers cost-effective printing solutions for custom vouchers or coupons with a fast turnaround time. Additionally, we provide printing services for gift certificates that include barcodes or QR codes.
Privacy Window Film and stickers are used on glass surfaces in offices, restaurants, and stores to create a frosted glass look. This application enhances privacy and addresses visibility concerns.

list.title: Frosted Glass Stickers
list.description: Frosted stickers or frosted glass films create the look of frosted or opaque glass, offering privacy and security without sacrificing light or visibility. These frosted glass stickers are easy to clean using standard glass cleaning products. They are durable and resistant to sunlight and UV damage. Frosted vinyl stickers are commonly used to enhance privacy in boardrooms and obscure views into personal spaces by applying the film to any partition or glass surface. Additionally, they provide an affordable upgrade to your old transparent glass compared to blinds or curtains.

list.title: Printed Frosted Stickers
list.description: The artwork is directly printed onto the frosted vinyl surface using a four-color printing process.This method preserves all the colors in the design while allowing some light to pass through both the printed and unprinted areas, thanks to its translucent quality.

list.title: Standard Cut & Reverse Cut Frosted Stickers
list.description: The letters or logo will be precisely cut from the frosted vinyl, with any interior elements removed to prevent solid filling. As a result, the design will remain colorless, showcasing only the frosted translucent effect.

list.title: Letterhead
description:
Enhance your company's image with our premium letterhead printing services in Dubai. Choose from a variety of designs, option for on-demand printing, and embrace eco-friendly practices with our Recycled Letterhead material. Our Recycled Letterhead Paper is crafted to deliver exceptional results, boasting a brighter and more uniform color while minimizing environmental impact.

Best of all Our full-color letterhead printing is available on a range of premium paper brands including Conqueror, Fedrigoni, woodfree, Executive Bonds, and more. A well-crafted letterhead lends a professional edge to all your communications, so don't wait—order yours today and leave a lasting impression!

list.title: Envelopes
description: Digitize Graphics in Dubai is your premier choice for business envelope printing. Whether you need custom or standard envelopes, including window envelopes, we've got you covered for all your business mailing needs. Save time by having your logo and address printed on specialty peel-and-seal or self-seal envelopes. Enhance your correspondence with customized envelope printing that showcases your unique style and brand. For a fast and professional solution, explore our ready-made envelope printing options, offering convenience with a personal touch.

list.title: Folders
description:
• Print Pocket Folder
  • With pocket presentation folders, you can make a strong impression before even starting your business pitch. Custom printed presentation folders are versatile marketing tools suitable for business proposals, new product launches, welcome packages, trade show materials, customer service agreements, and much more. The pockets can be designed with slits to hold business cards, mini-CDs, or DVDs on one or both sides. While a varnish coating is standard, you can choose Gloss or Matt Lamination, or UV coating to make your folder truly stand out.
  • Specifications
  • 350gsm Art Matt
  • One side printing
  • One side Matt Lamination
  • One side pocket - on right side
  • Open size: 44cm x 31cm

list.title: Notepads
description:
We offer premium notepads that enhance your business's professional image. These customized notepads are perfect for meetings, marketing events, and everyday office activities. You can incorporate your logo, slogan, or unique design to ensure your brand stands out.

Our notepads come in various sizes and styles, ideal for jotting down quick notes or detailed writing. Choose Digitize Graphics for personalized notepads that are both practical and effective for brand promotion, making a lasting impression with every note you write.

  • Features:
  • Binding: Top, Left, or Right Opening
  • Cover: Customizable - 170gsm smooth paper or thicker
  • Inner Pages: Available in 80gsm, 100gsm, or 120gsm uncoated wood-free paper
  • Page Printing: Fully Customizable

list.title: Note-books
description: Deluxe provides customizable hardcover book printing services, allowing you to personalize the cover with your preferred design or brand logo, printed edge-to-edge. Ideal for high-profile corporate events, product promotions, branding initiatives, or training programs, our printing options include full-color printing, thick foiling, or spot UV finishes, imparting a luxurious touch to your books.

list.title: Thank You Cards
description:
Ready to elevate your gratitude? Say thanks from the depths of your heart with a personalized card. Whether it's for a birthday bash, a dreamy wedding, or a simple act of kindness, a handwritten thank you note speaks volumes. We specialize in crafting thank you cards that reflect your individuality. From wedding appreciation to professional gestures, our cards are fully customizable. Add your personal touch with photos, bespoke text, and more. Say it with sincerity, say it with style - say thank you like never before.
  • Specification:
  • Size : Customized
  • Material : 350Gsm Art Matt
  • Printing : Both Sides
  • Matt Lamination : Both Sides

list.title: Calendars
description:
We specialize in creating a range of premium calendars tailored to your specific needs. Our Wall Calendars are perfect for planning your year and adding a personal touch to your space. For professionals looking to enhance their workspace, our Customized Desk Calendars offer a blend of practicality and elegance, keeping important dates always within reach.

Additionally, we offer Photo Poster Calendars that turn your cherished memories into functional art, and Tabletop Calendars ideal for any home or office setting. For those always on the go, our Pocket Calendars provide a compact solution for managing your schedule. With our comprehensive Calendar Printing Services, you can choose from various formats and designs to craft the perfect calendar that suits your personality and organizational needs. Explore our diverse collection today and find the perfect calendar to keep you organized all year long.

  • Types of Calendars we print

Guidelines for Supplying finished files - Ready to Print Artwork:
  • Apply a 2mm bleed over the finished size.
  • Convert all fonts to paths or curves.
  • Convert all colors to CMYK or Grayscale (No RGB, PMS, Pantone, or Spot colors).
  • Flatten transparency effects Set overprints correctly for desired result.
  • Remove all color profiles Ensure all bitmap images are minimum 300dpi and in CMYK color mode.
  • Ensure reversed type (light type on dark background) is a minimum of 7pt.
  • Please supply all files separately as we prefer to do our own imposing. PDF's should be individual files and not multi-page documents.
  • Ensure borders and type are within safe zone as variations may occur when trimming.
  • Remove registration marks, keylines, dyelines, and other non-printing items If crop marks are required, ensure they are positioned outside the bleed area

list.title: Booklets & Catalogues
description:
• Features and Specifications:
  • Cover page : 250gsm Matt or Gloss.
  • Inner pages : 170gsm Matt or Gloss.
  • Multi-Color Printing.
  • Sizes : A6, A5, A4 or any custom size up to A3.
  • Pages : From 4, 8, 12, 16, 20, 24, 28, 32 and more.
  • Guidelines for Supplying finished files - Ready to Print Artwork:
  • Apply a 2mm bleed over the finished size .
  • Convert all fonts to paths or curves .
  • Convert all colors to CMYK or Grayscale (No RGB, PMS, Pantone, or Spot colors).
  • Flatten transparency effects Set overprints correctly for desired result.
  • Remove all color profiles Ensure all bitmap images are minimum 300dpi and in CMYK color mode.
  • Ensure reversed type (light type on dark background) is a minimum of 7pt.
  • Please supply all files separately as we prefer to do our own imposing. PDF's should be individual files and not multi-page documents.
  • Ensure borders and type are within safe zone as variations may occur when trimming.
  • Remove registration marks, keylines, dyelines, and other non-printing items If crop marks are required, ensure they are positioned outside the bleed area.

list.title: Jersey
description: Jersey printing using dye sublimation has revolutionized the way businesses, schools, and sports teams create high-quality jerseys, making it more accessible and affordable. This innovative method significantly lowers the cost of printing small runs of unique items, allowing teams to design custom jerseys that stand out without breaking the bank. Unlike traditional methods such as screen printing or iron-on transfers, dye sublimation ensures a seamless, vibrant finish that covers the entire front panel of the jersey, eliminating issues like creasing and gaps between the ink and the seams.
description1: One of the key advantages of dye sublimation printing is its ability to handle an unlimited range of colors and shades, providing unmatched flexibility in design. This means that intricate patterns, gradients, and vivid color combinations can be achieved with ease, something that other forms of printing and embroidery cannot offer. Additionally, the sublimation process embeds the ink directly into the fabric, resulting in durable prints that won't fade, peel, or crack over time. Whether for sports teams looking to make a bold statement or organizations aiming to promote their brand, dye sublimation jersey printing is the optimal choice for creating eye-catching, long-lasting apparel.

Foam and Forex boards are cost-effective for short-term use with quick turnaround times.

  • Usage:
    • Tabletop or floor easels
    • Lean/prop against a wall
    • Hang on walls with double-sided tape
    • Hang from grommets
  • Material Options
    • Foam board core: 5mm, 10mm
    • Forex board core: 2mm, 3mm, 5mm, 10mm
  • Material Selection Factors
    • Purpose of use
    • Location
    • Size requirement
    • Duration of use
    • Budget

list.title: Shell Scheme
description:
For a stunning display at your upcoming show, consider our backlit modular standee. It can be customized in any size, angle, or shape, from backdrops to angular stands with arches. These stands can form a shell scheme by surrounding your booth on two or three sides. They feature high-quality, replaceable SEG graphics and are available for rent to meet budget goals.

  • Features:
    • Available on Rental basis
    • SEG backlit custom printed fabric graphics
    • Interchangeable frame design layout
    • Can use the frames together or separately
    • Pre-installed LED lights in each frame section
    • Graphics: Single or both sides
  • Place of use:
    • Exhibition hall
    • Hotel Ballroom
    • Spacious Villa
    • Malls
    • Showrooms/ Boutique
    • Indoor areas
    • Stand alone island exhibits
  • Branding:
    • One side OR
    • Both sides (front and back)

list.title: Pop Out Banner
description:
Pop out banners also know as Spring A boards are the most cost-effective and versatile option for indoor and outdoor advertising. They have been increasingly popular in recent years with sports event sponsorship, gyms, race tracks, and as signage to alert the public to the correct location.

  • Features:
  • Assemble in 30 Seconds
  • Light Weight, Portable and Durable
  • Suitable for outdoor and indoor branding
  • Can be staked to the ground for stability
  • Includes carry bag with metal pegs

list.title: Roll Up Banner
description:
Our Roll up banners give you portability and flexibility in very little space. We offer High Quality, urgent, professional, quick printed graphic, with added Matt or Gloss lamination for protection and anti-glare benefits. Our Rollups / Pullups are highly durable and available at Affordable low prices.

With portable Roll-up banners the graphic is stored in the base on a roller. The graphic is simply pulled up and secured by hooking it onto the supporting pole. The Rollup banner literally takes seconds to assemble and is supplied in a carry bag for easy transportation.You can submit your own design or our professional designer team will help you Design your banner (Images and Text to be Supplied by the Client).

  • Sizes Available:
    • Width x Height
    • 85 x 200 cm
    • 100 x 200 cm
    • 120 x 200 cm
    • 150 x 200 cm
    • 200 x 200 cm
    • 300 x 200 cm
    • 29.7 x 42 cm
    • 29.7 x 21 cm
